Title: Renown of Khaz Algar
Description:
There is still much we still need tae do to aid Khaz Algar.

But I dunnae know much about this land past the realms of earthen.

I'll have to refer ye to Faerin Lothar tae see what Hallowfall may need.

Talk to her an' see if she needs any help. Ye already are acquainted, aren't ye?
ObjectivesText: Speak with Faerin Lothar in Dornogal.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Faerin Lothar in Dornogal.
